channel.title: Teams for Annie.
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Teams for Annie."

item.title: Re: Teams for Annie.
item.content:encoded:
Knowledge is Power has been a page on here for a while.

Adding to the corresponding ally pages now.

Edit: Done. However, does Annie lvl 2 work for the team as well? I'd check myself, but I don't have the stamina for that today. If so, the pages would have to be updated to reflect upon that.

item.title: Teams for Annie.
item.content:encoded: The BVS-Wiki says the only team with Annie is with two other Girls ("Girl Power") Yet there is one more I know of, which is Annie, Sicko and the Scar, giving a +2 Range and I think +2 strength team bonus. I forgot the name, yet I used the team often on B-missions and A-missions in Season 1.
